name: Slack
natural_language_description: 这是 Slack 节点。主要用于: Consume Slack API

oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice
oldVersionNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken
available_options: Access Token (值: accessToken)
OAuth2 (值: oAuth2)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: message
available_options: Channel (值: channel)
File (值: file)
Message (值: message)
Reaction (值: reaction)
Star (值: star)
User (值: user)
User Group (值: userGroup)
User Profile (值: userProfile)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get (值: get) - Get your user's profile
Update (值: update) - Update user's profile

channelId.name: channelId
channelId.description: Channel containing the message. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
channelId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Channel Name or ID | 作用: Channel containing the message. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: include_labels (值: None) - Whether to include labels for each ID in custom profile fields
user (值: None) - User to retrieve profile info for

userIds.name: userIds
userIds.description: The ID of the user to invite into channel. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
userIds.natural_language_description: 参数名: User Names or IDs | 作用: The ID of the user to invite into channel. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

userId.name: userId
userId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: channelId (值: None) - Channel containing the file to be listed. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
showFilesHidden (值: None) - Whether to show truncated file info for files hidden due to being too old, and the team who owns the file being over the file limit
tsFrom (值: None) - Filter files created after this timestamp (inclusive)
tsTo (值: None) - Filter files created before this timestamp (inclusive)
types (值: None) - Filter files by type
userId (值: None) - Filter files created by a single user. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

resolveData.name: resolveData
resolveData.description: Whether to resolve the data automatically. By default the response only contain the ID to resource.
resolveData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resolve Data | 作用: Whether to resolve the data automatically. By default the response only contain the ID to resource. | 默认值: False

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 作用: Other options to set | 默认值: {}
available_options: channelIds (值: None) - The channels to send the file to. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
fileName (值: None) - Filename of file
initialComment (值: None) - The message text introducing the file in specified channels
threadTs (值: None) - Provide another message's ts value to upload this file as a reply. Never use a reply's ts value; use its parent instead.
title (值: None) - Title of file

name.name: name
name.description: A name for the User Group. Must be unique among User Groups.
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: A name for the User Group. Must be unique among User Groups. | (必填项)

ts.name: ts
ts.description: Timestamp of the message to be updated
ts.natural_language_description: 参数名: TS | 作用: Timestamp of the message to be updated | (必填项)

purpose.name: purpose
purpose.natural_language_description: 参数名: Purpose | 作用: A new, specialer purpose | (必填项)

topic.name: topic
topic.description: The new topic string. Does not support formatting or linkification.
topic.natural_language_description: 参数名: Topic | 作用: The new topic string. Does not support formatting or linkification. | (必填项)

timestamp.name: timestamp
timestamp.natural_language_description: 参数名: Timestamp | 作用: Timestamp of the message | (必填项)

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel to send the message to
channel.natural_language_description: 参数名: Channel | 作用: The channel to send the message to | (必填项)

user.name: user
user.description: The ID of the user to get the online status of
user.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: The ID of the user to get the online status of | (必填项)

text.name: text
text.description: New text for the message, using the default formatting rules. It's not required when presenting attachments.
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: New text for the message, using the default formatting rules. It's not required when presenting attachments.

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: False

otherOptions.name: otherOptions
otherOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 作用: Other options to set | 默认值: {}
available_options: icon_emoji (值: None) - Emoji to use as the icon for this message. Overrides icon_url.
icon_url (值: None) - URL to an image to use as the icon for this message
link_names (值: None) - Whether to find and link channel names and usernames
thread_ts (值: None) - Provide another message's ts value to make this message a reply
mrkdwn (值: None) - Whether to use Slack Markdown parsing
reply_broadcast (值: None) - Whether the reply should be made visible to everyone in the channel or conversation. Use in conjunction with thread_ts.
unfurl_links (值: None) - Whether to enable unfurling of primarily text-based content
unfurl_media (值: None) - Whether to disable unfurling of media content
sendAsUser (值: None) - The message will be sent from this username (i.e. as if this individual sent the message).

attachments.name: attachments
attachments.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attachments | 作用: The attachment to add | 默认值: {}
available_options: fallback (值: None) - Required plain-text summary of the attachment
text (值: None) - Text to send
title (值: None) - Title of the message
title_link (值: None) - Link of the title
color (值: None) - Color of the line left of text
pretext (值: None) - Text which appears before the message block
author_name (值: None) - Name that should appear
author_link (值: None) - Link for the author
author_icon (值: None) - Icon which should appear for the user
image_url (值: None) - URL of image
thumb_url (值: None) - URL of thumbnail
footer (值: None) - Text of footer to add
footer_icon (值: None) - Icon which should appear next to footer
ts (值: None) - Time message relates to
fields (值: None) - Fields to add to message

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: channels (值: None) - A comma-separated string of encoded channel IDs for which the User Group uses as a default. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
description (值: None) - A short description of the User Group
handle (值: None) - A mention handle. Must be unique among channels, users and User Groups.
include_count (值: None) - Whether to include the number of users in each User Group
name (值: None) - A name for the User Group. Must be unique among User Groups.

attachmentsJson.name: attachmentsJson
attachmentsJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attachments | 作用: The attachments to add

blocksJson.name: blocksJson
blocksJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Blocks | 作用: The blocks to add

blocksUi.name: blocksUi
blocksUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Blocks | 作用: The blocks to add | 默认值: {}
available_options: blocksValues (值: None)

binaryData.name: binaryData
binaryData.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field
binaryData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Binary File | 作用: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field | 默认值: False

fileContent.name: fileContent
fileContent.description: The text content of the file to upload
fileContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Content | 作用: The text content of the file to upload

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded | 默认值: data | (必填项)

userGroupId.name: userGroupId
userGroupId.description: The encoded ID of the User Group to update
userGroupId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User Group ID | 作用: The encoded ID of the User Group to update | (必填项)
